summary: The Skill Assessment LLM analyzed the skill gap for a Data Analyst (3 yrs exp, Python, SQL, Excel) aiming for a Data Scientist role. Strengths include a solid foundation in Python, SQL, Excel, and practical experience. Key development areas are Statistical & Mathematical Foundations, Machine Learning Expertise, Advanced Python Libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn), Experimentation Design, Data Modeling, Feature Engineering, Big Data, and Cloud. Recommendations prioritize: 1) Foundational ML & Statistics, 2) Advanced Python for Data Science, 3) Practical Application & Portfolio Building, and 4) Complementary skills like Cloud/Big Data.
